Gun Violence Prevention

Gun violence is a public health crisis that affects communities across our district. We need common-sense gun safety measures that protect our families while respecting the rights of responsible gun owners.

Universal Background Checks

I support requiring background checks for all gun sales, including private sales and gun shows. This is a common-sense measure that the vast majority of Americans support.

Red Flag Laws

Extreme risk protection orders, or "red flag" laws, allow law enforcement and family members to temporarily remove firearms from individuals who pose a danger to themselves or others. I will work to implement and strengthen these laws.

Assault Weapons Ban

Military-style assault weapons and high-capacity magazines have no place in our communities. I support banning these weapons of war.

Safe Storage Requirements

I support requirements for safe storage of firearms to prevent accidents and keep guns out of the hands of children and unauthorized users.

Addressing Root Causes

Preventing gun violence also means addressing the root causes, including mental health services, community violence intervention programs, and economic opportunity.
